channel.title: Mac OS X [ RS PS ]
channel.description: Is it possible to make a runescape private server on mac pc if so give me some guidance please!.

item.title: Mac OS X [ RS PS ]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

EazY:

Highly appreciate the positive feedback I don’t got a clue what to do but i’m a fast learner and willing to learn. Can you give me some proper links of winrar, and everything else I will be needing…

WinRAR is commercial and in my opinion, it’s not the best.

Macs already have an archive program installed by default I believe. If you want, you can download 7-Zip which I believe is the best (and it’s open source too).

You will be needing your source, Java JRE (already installed), and Java JDK (already installed too I think).

Try it. Type “javac” and “java” inside Terminal (the Mac version of CMD).

Read full topic

item.title: Mac OS X [ RS PS ]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Of course!

Javawise, everything will be the same. You can run your server by double clicking the main class (usually server.java) instead of running a batch file. Of course, you still have to portforward and allow an exception in your firewall.

Read full topic
